content.p: Unit web coordinators look after certain sections of the website. Please speak with your unit web coordinator before submitting a support request. They may be able to help. Victoria Wrigley Jodie Le Resche (larger web projects) victoria.wrigley@nottingham.ac.uk jodie.leresche@nottingham.ac.uk Mita Saxena Sarah O'Brien mita.saxena1@nottingham.ac.uk sarah.o'brien@nottingham.ac.uk Web and UI Officers For all other web support requests, please submit a support request to the Web and UI Officers rather than contacing them directly. They cover support across all areas, but also have a faculty they specialise in. Louise Ahern (MHS) Adam Berrington (Business) Jocelyn Daniels (Social Sciences) Daniel Hill (Research and reputation) Alice Johnston (Science) Michael Timmins (Arts) Support request form Web project submission: Please discuss with your faculty's marketing head as listed above.
